Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Added full support for SQL Server 2000/2019 Express. Version control on exported files. New faster user interactions.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 800 x 600 Display Size, MS SQL Server or MSDE.

English.Char_Desc_45: SSuite Office - FileWall is a secure document database.
English.Char_Desc_80: SSuite Office - FileWall is a secure client-server database.
English.Char_Desc_250: SSuite Office - FileWall is a secure client-server database to archive all your sensitive documents in one place.
English.Char_Desc_450:
SSuite Office - FileWall is a secure client-server database to archive all your sensitive documents in one place.
Features in SSuite Office - FileWall:
* Full search capabilities * Administrator and user level access * Create multiple categories on different security levels * View unique log file history for each document on user access * Full version control of all documents or files imported into the database
English.Char_Desc_2000:
SSuite Office - FileWall is a secure client-server database to archive all your sensitive documents in one place.
When the administrator logs in, only he can change the passwords, user level access, and add or delete file categories for user access. Only the database administrator has access to the administration settings. Users have access only to the files that have been entered in their access level. All files outside the user's access level, cannot be seen or accessed according to their assigned security level.
Features in SSuite Office - FileWall:
* Full search capabilities * Administrator and user level access * Create multiple categories on different security levels * View unique log file history for each document on user access * Full version control of all documents or files imported into the database * Enhanced document compression for a more efficient and smaller database * Full document control for importing, exporting, and adding new documents to the database.
The download file also includes a help file to show you how to attach a new database to SQL server or MSDE.
Minimum System Requirements:
* Display Size - 800 x 600 / 1024 x 768 * Runs on all Windows systems - Windows 95 to Windows 10 and beyond... * Microsoft SQL Server 2000/2019 Express or Microsoft Database Engine - ( MSDE )
What's New in This Release:
- Faster user interactions on importing and exporting of documents - Multiple document import - Enhanced security for user access - Direct document access from database.
New Online Desktop Software: https://desktop.ssuiteoffice.com/
No Java and No DotNet. Green Energy Software. Saving the planet one bit at a time...
